prompt: Photorealistic image of an antique appraiser's hands carefully examining the base markings of an ornate 19th-century German stoneware beer stein with a magnifying glass. The scene is set on a rich mahogany desk cluttered with antique valuation tools, reference books, and calipers. Soft, focused lighting highlights the stein and hands, creating a sense of discovery and expertise. Composition follows the rule of thirds, with the stein slightly off-center. Professional photography style, shallow depth of field, landscape format --ar 16:9
name: antique-beer-steins-value-image-1.png

prompt: A single, exceptionally detailed and valuable antique Mettlach beer stein from the late 1800s, featuring intricate relief scenes and a complex figural pewter lid, showcased against a dark, subtly textured background. Dramatic, museum-style spotlighting illuminates the stein, emphasizing its craftsmanship, vibrant colors, and historical significance. The stein is positioned centrally but low in the frame to convey importance within the wide landscape view. Ultra-realistic, high-resolution photography --ar 16:9
name: antique-beer-steins-value-image-2.png

prompt: Wide-angle shot of a well-lit antique wooden display cabinet filled with a diverse collection of valuable antique beer steins. Include examples of stoneware, porcelain, glass, and pewter-lidded steins from different eras and regions (e.g., Mettlach, Regimental, Character steins). Warm, ambient lighting illuminates the collection, showcasing the variety in shapes, sizes, and decorative styles. Focus is sharp across the entire collection, emphasizing the breadth and potential value range for collectors. Professional catalogue photography style, landscape orientation --ar 16:9
name: antique-beer-steins-value-image-3.png

prompt: Extreme close-up macro photograph focusing on the intricate hand-painted details and textured relief carvings on the side of an antique faience beer stein. Highlight the fine brushstrokes, subtle color variations, and the aged patina of the ceramic and pewter lid hinge. Use a very shallow depth of field to isolate the detailed section, blurring the background softly. Natural, diffused side lighting enhances the texture and dimensionality of the craftsmanship, key factors in determining value. High detail, photorealistic --ar 16:9
name: antique-beer-steins-value-image-4.png

prompt: An atmospheric shot of a single, characterful antique German beer stein (perhaps depicting a historical scene or figure) resting on an old, worn wooden table inside a dimly lit antique shop or collector's study. Sunlight streams through a nearby window, creating volumetric light rays that illuminate dust motes and highlight the stein. Surrounding objects like old maps, coins, and leather-bound books add context and narrative. The composition uses leading lines from the table edge towards the stein. Moody, evocative, photorealistic style --ar 16:9
name: antique-beer-steins-value-image-5.png
